title: Personal Portfolio
description: Personal Portfolio is a website that showcases your skills, projects, and contact information. We can also share out experience. It is a great way to show your work to the world.

title: Outlook Event Manager
description: Outlook Event manager uses Graph API to fetch events from Outlook calendar and display them in a user-friendly way. It also allows users to create, update, and delete events.

title: Weather Forecast API
description: This project is a FastAPI web service that fetches and visualizes weather data based on latitude and longitude coordinates. It includes various API available in fastapi docs section.

title: NoteKeep - Mimic of Google Keep
description: This Notepad application, built with Vue.js and Node.js, allows users to create, read, and delete notes. It features dark mode support, search functionality, and uses MongoDB for data storage.
